q_ch: 在我们的所有仓库中，库存不为0的原材料有哪些，整理成{类型：剩余数量}的形式。
q_en: What are the raw materials with non zero inventory in all of our warehouses, organized in the form of 'Type: Remaining Quantity'?
gt:
Sure thing! Here's a lively and friendly summary of the raw materials with non-zero inventory in all of our warehouses, organized in a neat table for you. 😊

| Material Type      | Remaining Quantity |
|--------------------|--------------------|
| Cotton Fabric      | 3500               |
| Wool               | 4100               |
| Silk               | 1100               |
| Leather            | 2200               |
| Synthetic Fiber    | 2300               |
| Denim Fabric       | 4500               |
| Down               | 1230               |
| Down Pieces        | 2420               |

These are the materials that are currently stocked up in our warehouses. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😄

steps.sql: SELECT id, name FROM materials WHERE type = 'origin';
steps.description: Retrieve the IDs and names of all original materials

steps.sql: SELECT wm.material_id, SUM(wm.left_number) as remaining_quantity FROM warehouse_material wm JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id WHERE m.type = 'origin' AND wm.left_number > 0 GROUP BY wm.material_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the remaining quantity of each original material with non-zero inventory from all warehouses

steps.sql: SELECT m.name, remaining_quantity FROM (SELECT wm.material_id, SUM(wm.left_number) as remaining_quantity FROM warehouse_material wm JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id WHERE m.type = 'origin' AND wm.left_number > 0 GROUP BY wm.material_id) AS subquery JOIN materials m ON subquery.material_id = m.id;
steps.description: Combine the material names with their remaining quantities
